text: Brrda phu sraththa thanghlay thæcring brrda mu chri knan somm dangnan phwk khea cng xya khea kıl xal-masyidi l ha rxm hlangcak pi khxng phwk khea ni læa hak phwk cea klaw khwam yakcn xallxhˌ k ca thrng hı phwk cea mangmi cak khwam kruna khxng phraxngkh hak phraxngkh thrng prasngkh thæ cring xallxhˌ pen phuthrng rxbru phuthrng pricha yan
